doc.title: Zokonda padziko lonse lapansi

example.domain: Mutha kuwonjezera dzina ladomeni, monga {{url}}, kuti musakhale ndi dzina lonse.
example.url: Mungathe kuchotsa maulalo enaake powonjezera ulalo, monga {{url}}.
example.glob: Mutha kuwonjezera {{glob}} pateni, monga {{minimatch}}, kuti mufanane movutikira.

doc.script: Mutha kugwiritsanso ntchito js scripts kuti mukwaniritse kuwongolera mwaukadaulo.
doc.checkedUseScript: Kaya mutsegule zolemba zanu, dziwani kuti muyenera kuyang'ana mabokosi onse nthawi imodzi kuti mutsegule.

example1.commentTitle: Panopa pa tsamba la {{youtube}}, mukuyenera kutsegula tsamba la {{youtube}} la {{watch}} kapena {{akabudula}} mu tabu yatsopano.
example1.page: : Ulalo ndi chinthu chomwe chili patsamba latsambali kuti mudziwe zambiri, Chonde onani
example1.isSameSubDomain: {{isSameSubDomain}}: Dzina la domeni lomwelo, ngakhale mayina akuluakulu a {{youtube}} ndi {{families}} onse ndi {{mainDomain}}, mayina a subdomain ndi {{youtubeSubDomain}} ndi {{ familySubDomain}} motsatana.
example1.minimatch: : {{glob}} njira yofananira, pogwiritsa ntchito laibulale ya {{minimatch}}, njira yogwiritsira ntchito Chonde Onani, kapena mutha kusaka momwe mungagwiritsire ntchito {{glob}}.
example1.rightTab: : Ulalo umatsegulidwa mu tabu yatsopano kumanja
example1.wholeCode: Tanthauzo la nambala yonseyi ndikuti patsamba la YouTube la {{www}} la mayina, ngati ulalo womwe wadina uli womwewo ndipo njira imayamba ndi {{watch}} kapena {{shorts}}, ndiye tsamba latsopano. tsamba kumanja adzakhala Open.
